form.url-helptext: URL of Redmine installation (including context path).
form.textFormatting-helptext: Type of text formatting used for redmine comments.
form.autoClose-helptext: Enables the state changes function. SCM-Manager searches for issue keys and issue status keywords in commit messages. If both found in a message SCM-Manager changes the state of the issue in Redmine. Note: It is necessary to specify username and password for Redmine.
form.updateIssues-helptext: Enable the automatic update function. SCM-Manager searches for issue keys in commit messages. If a issue id is found SCM-Manager  updates the issue with a comment. Note: It is necessary to specify username and password for Redmine.
form.disableRepositoryConfiguration-helptext: Do not allow repository owners to configure Redmine instances.
